languages.text: "В машинах не бывает вины — они сработали правильно. А вот люди... Как обычно подвели".

traits.locale_text: "В машинах не бывает вины — они сработали правильно. А вот люди... Как обычно подвели".

languages.text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
languages.original_text: "В машинах не бывает вины — они сработали правильно. А вот люди... Как обычно подвели".

traits.locale_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
"Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
"Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
"Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
"Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
"Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

languages.text: 「機械は犯罪の責任を問われない、正しくその機能を果たしただけだ。だが人間は…人間はいつでも失敗する」
languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

traits.locale_text: 「機械は犯罪の責任を問われない、正しくその機能を果たしただけだ。だが人間は…人間はいつでも失敗する」

languages.text: "Maschinen sind nie an einem Verbrechen schuld. Sie führen ihre Funktion korrekt aus. Menschen dagegen ... Menschen versagen immer."
languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

traits.locale_text: "Maschinen sind nie an einem Verbrechen schuld. Sie führen ihre Funktion korrekt aus. Menschen dagegen ... Menschen versagen immer."

languages.text: « Les machines ne peuvent jamais se rendre coupables de crimes, elles se contentent de remplir leurs fonctions. Les gens, cependant... Eux sont toujours faillibles. »
languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

traits.locale_text: « Les machines ne peuvent jamais se rendre coupables de crimes, elles se contentent de remplir leurs fonctions. Les gens, cependant... Eux sont toujours faillibles. »

languages.text: «No se puede culpar a las máquinas de ningún crimen: desempeñaron sus funciones correctamente. La gente, por otro lado... La gente siempre yerra».
languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

traits.locale_text: «No se puede culpar a las máquinas de ningún crimen: desempeñaron sus funciones correctamente. La gente, por otro lado... La gente siempre yerra».

languages.text: “无论犯下了什么样的罪责，机器永远都不该承担责任，它们仅仅是在正确地履行着它们的职能。至于人嘛……人总是会踏上歧途。”
languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

traits.locale_text: “无论犯下了什么样的罪责，机器永远都不该承担责任，它们仅仅是在正确地履行着它们的职能。至于人嘛……人总是会踏上歧途。”

languages.text: "Hiçbir suçun müsebbibi makineler değil, onlar işlevlerini yerine getiriyor sadece. Asıl suçlular, insanlar."
languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."

traits.locale_text: "Hiçbir suçun müsebbibi makineler değil, onlar işlevlerini yerine getiriyor sadece. Asıl suçlular, insanlar."

languages.original_text: "Machines are never to blame for a crime — they performed their function correctly. People, however... People will always fail."
